author: oheger
msg: Added a setRoot() method to InMemoryNodeModel.

author: rgoers
msg: LOG4J2-547 - Have Logger API expose a PrintWriter instead of custom LoggerStream.

author: rgoers
msg: LOG4J2-439 - Add EncodingPatternConverter to escape newlines and HTML special characters.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10647] Fix the bug of not decrease from size in updateColumnValue when removing the old columns.

In `MemStore.updateColumnValue`, when removing old values, `size` is not decreased, but local variable `addedSize` is decreased, so size is greater than real value. This leads to the problem of negative value for `HRegion.memstoreSize`.
Add a new case in `TestMemStore` to test it.

author: brane
msg: Follow up to r1573106: Make the test program source language-dependent.
(_SVN_XXFLAGS_ADD_IFELSE): Renumber arguments and make $4 the program source.
Pass the language-specific program source to _SVN_XXFLAGS_ADD_IFELSE.
